products.description: Product id: db-rbx2346 fabric colour: parchment material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes stripe solar parchment roller blind in brown. Made to measure from 15. 46 with free uk mainland delivery.

products.title: Melton Desert Sand
products.description: Melton desert sand made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Fuji Silk Zen Sand Roller Blind
products.description: If youre after an alternative to a more neutral coloured roller blind, then the fuji silk zen sand roller blind is a brilliant option, with its luxury silky texture and golden sandy color, this blind will enhance your window and add an aura of sophistication to your home. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Shot Silk Pannacotta
products.description: Shot silk pannacotta made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Woven Parchment Roller Blind
products.description: With is textured finish, this blind is perfect for adding a layer of style to your window without compromising on quality. With the woven fabric texture on the front of this blind, you can add a literal touch of class to your windows. Being a dimout fabric makes this blind perfect for kitchens, bathrooms and living rooms where you need privacy, but don't want to block all of the light. Woven parchment roller blind.

products.title: Amor Beige With Haze Pure Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor beige and haze pure double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Versailles Blackout Mushroom Roller Blind
products.description: Bring luxury to any family space with the practical versailles mushroom blackout roller blind. This print inspired by chic french interiors features an ornate pattern picked out in grey and exceptionally printed on convenient wipe-clean, blackout fabric. The subtle, two-tone design gives this intricate motif a simplicity that can be used to great effect. Layer with varying shades of grey to add depth and drama to a room.

products.title: Anthology, Sand Dune - Roller Blind
products.description: Inspirational quality is the only way to describe sand dune, and if you think we're exaggerating then just look at the intricacy of the weave. It's the foundation on which the rest of the design is built, and offers plenty of room for the subtle flecks of white to express themselves. Matching sand dune with other textured finishes like fine wooden grains and cracked leather is a great way to build a theme that's about more than just pure colour.

products.title: Amor Beige With Haze Soft Grey Double Roller Blind
products.description: Combining two of their most popular roller blinds in one, this amor beige and haze soft grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout amor soft grey to block out the light. Their double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice.

products.title: Ferns, Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns in sand is the dreamy and relaxing fabric you have been searching for, and it's now available as a classic roller blind. The causal way in which the ferns twist and turn on the fabric, catching the light in different ways as they go is testament to the refined subtlety of the design. Transforming the guest bedroom used to be the job that would never end, but those days are now a thing of the past.

products.title: Anthology (Blackout), Sand Dune - Roller Blind
products.description: If you love to get away from the hustle and bustle and make your way to the coast then the anthology (blackout) range's sand dune fabric could be just what you need. It combines an intricate weave with a colour that ebbs and flows effortlessly. Perfect for adding a refined touch to any home. When you take in the intricate way in which the shades and tones flow into one another you come to appreciate the keen eye for detail that must have created it.

products.title: Crosshatch, Sandstorm - Roller Blind
products.description: Sandstorm provides a touch of natural colour combined in perfect harmony with a luxurious pattern that ticks all the right boxes. This is a fabric that means something different to different people. You might feel it's luxurious, authentic, glamorous, elegant, or a whole host of other things. What matters is you find a place for it in your home. We love the idea of using the gentle sandy colour to add a sleepy and wholesome quality to the bedroom.

products.title: Verdi (Blackout), Sahara Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Verdi (blackout) sahara sand takes its inspiration from the endless expanse of desert that allows your mind to wander. The calming colour is perfect for setting your mind at ease, whilst the authenticity of the curves means you can add that regal touch you've been searching for. Pairing sahara sand with a variety of patterned wall papers and rugs is a great way to breathe new life into the living room.

products.title: Luster, Desert Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Desert sand from their luster range introduces a delicate array of colours into the mix that you won't find anywhere else. From woody browns to crisp whites, and with plenty of sandy tones thrown in for good measure, it offers a welcome relief from the single colour fabrics you've been looking at until now. Introducing a calm and natural style of decor is something that more and more homes are doing in the last few years and when you see the results online it's easy to see why.

products.title: Missprint Blackout Persia Picalilli
products.description: Roller blinds made to measure blackout roller blind missprint blackout persia picalilli made to measure roller blind.
